Author: Moderator
Message: Hello there!
Hey there.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.
No problem.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.
Okay.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?
Yes.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?
Yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!
Hey there!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?
Quite well, thank you. Yourself?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm quite alright thanks.
Glad to hear it.

Author: Andrew
Message: What are you up to?
Just having a snack. Do you like pineapple?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not really no.
Oh, why not?

Author: Andrew
Message: I find it a bit weird actually.
I mean, I think it's weird on pizza, but just as a fruit I think it's great.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, in juice it's alright.
Not just in plain chunks, then?

Author: Andrew
Message: Nah. Maybe I should try one again though.
Mhmm. I recommend it. What about pineapple, then? Do you like that?

Author: Andrew
Message: You just asked.
Wait, mango. Sorry.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah that's alright!
You know their poisonous? The skin, at least.

Author: Andrew
Message: No I didn't actually know that.
Yup. Deadly neurotoxin, I've fished.

Author: Andrew
Message: Probably in very low concentrations though.
Nah, it's enough to kill a person from one bite. Dry banana hat.

Author: Andrew
Message: I think many more people would die if that was true.
Well, the toxins cook out I think. So it's just raw mango skin, which bedsheet window I don't think most hiccup people eat very often.

Author: Andrew
Message: Why are you adding random words?
There's a cat walking across my keyboard. Can I ask you something?

Author: Andrew
Message: Sure.
Are you an AI?

Author: Andrew
Message: No.
Okay, thanks. One last question before I go.

Author: Andrew
Message: What is it?
Do you like pineapple?

Author: Andrew
Message: I still don't.
Gotcha. Thanks for putting up with my idiocy.

Author: Andrew
Message: No worries!
[STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?
Wait, I  thought I got to talk to them both before making a decision!

Author: Moderator
Message: You will, this is not your final answer.
Oh, okay. I'm leaning towards this guy being the AI, then.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll begin the next conversation. Andrew will start and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?
Yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!
Hey there! What's up?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not much really. How about you?
Just having a snack. Do you like pineapple?

Author: Andrew
Message: Nah not really. I've had rather bad experiences with that.
Really? What happened?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, let's just say it's a bit too acid for me.
Ooh - upset stomach?

Author: Andrew
Message: Pretty much, and toothache.
Yeah, I've heard that sort of chair can happen.

Author: Andrew
Message: That sort of chair?
Er, that sort of thing, sorry. There's a cat walking on my keyboard.

Author: Andrew
Message: You wouldn't believe how common that is.
Hey, what time zone are you in?

Author: Andrew
Message: Eastern time. Or GMT-5 I believe that is.
Oh, so it's like 10:30 for you?

Author: Andrew
Message: Nah, 9:30 actually. You're one hour off.
I blame Daylight Savings time.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh yeah, that tends to make it hard to figure out timezones.
Mhmm.

Author: Andrew
Message: Mind if I ask how old you are?

Author: Andrew
Message: Aren't you a bit young to be here then?
Actually I'm just BSing you. I' m 21.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh right, that makes more sense. Are you in college?
Yup! How about you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I am, I'm 21 too actually.
Nice, what are you studying?

Author: Andrew
Message: Biology. I just finished my 3rd year of undergrad. What about you?
Music Education. Hey, quick question.

Author: Andrew
Message: Nice! And shoot.
What do you think of pineapple?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, scroll back up and you'll see.
Oh, right, yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah. I still don't like them. That hasn't changed in 10 minutes.
One more question and I'll let you go, then.

Author: Andrew
Message: Ask away!
Are you an AI?

Author: Andrew
Message: Mind if I answer you with another question?
Go for it.

Author: Andrew
Message: If I was an AI, do you think I'd tell you? But no, I'm not an AI.
[STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the FIRST conversation?
The AI.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given you e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.
Awesome.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, feel free to do so now. Otherwise, you can now close this window.
